superresolution.screen.config.name: Super Resolution Configuration
superresolution.screen.info.name: Information
superresolution.name: Super Resolution
superresolution.common_requirement.not_s:
OpenGL version does not meet requirements
Required version: %s.%s
Actual version: %s.%s

Missing required OpenGL extensions
Missing extensions: %s
superresolution.screen.button.tooltip.ap: Save configuration without closing this interface
superresolution.screen.button.tooltip.cl: Close this interface without saving configuration
superresolution.screen.button.tooltip.do: Close this interface and save configuration
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: When enabled, the selected algorithm will be used for super resolution upscaling

Higher values result in lower in-game resolution, blurrier visuals, reduced performance cost
Lower values result in higher in-game resolution, clearer visuals, better image quality but increased performance cost
Current rendering resolution: %sx%s
Current rendering precision: %s
Recommended range: 1.4~1.8

Lower values make object edges more distinct
Higher values make distant objects blurrier
Recommended value: around 0.55
superresolution.algo.not_support.fsr1: Your OpenGL version is below 4.3. FSR1 features will be automatically disabled
superresolution.algo.not_support.none: Seeing this message indicates a bug in NT author's code
superresolution.algo.not_support.fsr2: Your GPU lacks required OpenGL extensions. FSR2 features will be automatically disabled.
superresolution.algo.not_support.nis: OpenGL version below 4.5 or missing required OpenGL/Vulkan extensions. NVIDIA Image Scaling features will be automatically disabled
superresolution.screen.info.button.label: OpenGL Extension Info
Vulkan Extension Info
superresolution.screen.config.special.fs:
Version of FSR2. There are some differences between versions.
Default is 2.3.3.
superresolution.screen.info.text.open_so: Special thanks to the authors and contributors of following libraries. This mod wouldn't exist without their work.
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: Development environment only. Enable RenderDoc integration
Development environment only. Enable debug interface
superresolution.screen.config.warn.mobil: Warning: Running on mobile device. This mod's mobile support is unstable and may cause unexpected issues
superresolution.screen.config.warn.algor: Warning: Currently selected algorithm is unstable
Warning: Currently selected algorithm is incomplete and non-functional
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: Skipping native library loading may cause malfunctions
Skipping Vulkan initialization may affect some algorithms
superresolution.screen.config.special.fs: Improves performance with slight quality loss when enabled
Improves performance with slight quality loss when enabled
superresolution.screen.config.special.sg:
CS_2 Compute Shader/2 Pass - Moderate performance/quality
CS_3 Compute Shader/3 Pass - Lower performance/Best quality
FS_2 Fragment Shader/2 Pass - Best performance/Lower quality
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: Motion vectors can enhance the super-resolution quality of certain algorithms (FSR2, SGSR2) but may introduce performance overhead
superresolution.screen.config.options.la: Pause game when configuration interface is open
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: Enable more detailed GPU performance profiling to analyze bottlenecks.

Some mods use PostChain to implement UI effects. Injecting into PostChain with this mod may cause UI effects to render at the world rendering resolution, leading to rendering issues (e.g., blurred interfaces like in ModernUI)
Add PostChain names you wish to exclude here, and this mod will skip them during injection
Changes might require a game restart to take effect
superresolution.screen.config.error.unsu: The current environment does not support this algorithm
superresolution.screen.config.error.capt: The current capture mode is not available on %s
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: Enables compiling shaders using a compatibility shader compiler for wider hardware support.
superresolution.screen.config.options.la: Disable Super Resolution When Shaders Are Off
superresolution.screen.config.options.to: Automatically disable Super Resolution when shaders are turned off
When enabled, the mod will ignore the shader pack’s Super Resolution compatibility config and perform scaling in normal mode
